assetsToShares((address,address,address,.details: derive the shares for an amount of assets in a market

params.assets: the assets to derive the shares for

build(address,address,bytes).details: Standard build pattern - MUST include preExecute first, postExecute last

params.account: The account to perform executions for (usually an ERC7579 account)
params.data: The hook-specific parameters and configuration data
params.prevHook: The address of the previous hook in the chain, or address(0) if first

returns.executions: Array of Execution structs defining calls to make

decodeUsePrevHookAmount(bytes).details: Used to create hook chains where output from one hook becomes input to the next

returns._0: True if the hook should use the previous hook's output amount

deriveCollateralForFullRepayment(bytes32.details: derive the collateral balance of the account

params.account: the account to derive the collateral balance for

returns.collateralAmount: the collateral balance of the account

deriveCollateralForPartialRepayment(byte.details: derive the collateral amount for partial repayment

params.account: the account to derive the collateral amount for

returns.withdrawableCollateral: the collateral amount for partial repayment

deriveLoanAmount(bytes32,address).details: derive the loan amount of the account

params.account: the account to derive the loan amount for

returns.loanAmount: the loan amount of the account

deriveShareBalance(bytes32,address).details: derive the share balance of the account

params.account: the account to derive the share balance for

returns.borrowShares: the share balance of the account

getCollateralTokenAddress(bytes).details: Used to identify which asset is being used to secure the loan

params.data: The hook-specific data containing collateral information

returns._0: The address of the collateral token

params.account: The account to check the collateral balance for
params.data: The hook-specific data containing collateral parameters

returns._0: The amount of tokens currently used as collateral

getLoanTokenAddress(bytes).details: Used to identify which asset is being borrowed from the lending protocol

params.data: The hook-specific data containing loan information

returns._0: The address of the borrowed token

getLoanTokenBalance(address,bytes).details: Used to track outstanding loan amounts

params.account: The account to check the loan balance for
params.data: The hook-specific data containing loan parameters

returns._0: The amount of tokens currently borrowed

getOutAmount(address).details: This is the primary output value used by subsequent hooks

params.caller: The caller address for context identification

returns._0: The amount of tokens (assets or shares) processed
The arguments of the hook encoded

postExecute(address,address,bytes).details: Called after the main execution, used to update hook state and calculate results      Sets output values (outAmount, usedShares, etc.) for subsequent hooks

params.account: The account operations were performed for
params.data: The hook-specific parameters and configuration data
params.prevHook: The address of the previous hook in the chain, or address(0) if first

preExecute(address,address,bytes).details: Called before the main execution, used to validate inputs and set execution context      This method may perform state changes to set up the hook's execution state

params.account: The account to perform operations for
params.data: The hook-specific parameters and configuration data
params.prevHook: The address of the previous hook in the chain, or address(0) if first

params.caller: The caller address for context identification

setExecutionContext(address).details: Used for security validation between preExecute and postExecute calls

params.caller: The caller address for context identification

setOutAmount(uint256,address).details: Used for updating `outAmount` when fees were deducted

params.caller: The caller address for context identification
params.outAmount: The amount of tokens processed by the hook

sharesToAssets((address,address,address,.details: derive the assets for a share balance in a market

params.account: the account to derive the assets for

subtype().details: Used to categorize hooks beyond the basic HookType      For example, a hook might be of type INFLOW but subtype VAULT_DEPOSIT

returns._0: A bytes32 identifier for the specific hook functionality

asset().notice: The primary asset address this hook operates on

build(address,address,bytes).notice: Builds the execution array for the hook operation

decodeUsePrevHookAmount(bytes).notice: Determines if this hook should use the amount from the previous hook

executionNonce().notice: Execution nonce for creating unique contexts

getCollateralTokenAddress(bytes).notice: Gets the address of the token used as collateral

getCollateralTokenBalance(address,bytes).notice: Gets the current collateral token balance for an account

getLoanTokenAddress(bytes).notice: Gets the address of the token being borrowed

getLoanTokenBalance(address,bytes).notice: Gets the current loan token balance for an account

getOutAmount(address).notice: The amount of tokens processed by the hook in a given caller context, subject to fees after update

hookType().notice: The type of hook (NONACCOUNTING, INFLOW, OUTFLOW)

setExecutionContext(address).notice: Sets the caller address that initiated the execution

setOutAmount(uint256,address).notice: Sets the output amount for the hook

spToken().notice: The special token address (if any) associated with this hook's operation

subType().notice: The specific subtype identifier for this hook

subtype().notice: Returns the specific subtype identification for this hook

usedShares().notice: The number of shares used by this hook's operation
